text: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦۖ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ

translation.en: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel
translation.id: Dan sungguh, telah Kami anugerahkan Kitab (Taurat) kepada Musa, maka janganlah engkau (Muhammad) ragu-ragu menerimanya (Alquran) dan Kami jadikan Kitab (Taurat) itu petunjuk bagi Bani Israil
